level.heading: State consent.
level.text: The enactment of this unit shall, as respects the District of Columbia, be deemed to satisfy any requirement of state consent contained in any of the laws or provisions of law referred to in § 38-1202.09.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-36
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-36, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 38-1202.01.
